column1:
Summarized Insights  
Top Category: Technology is the highest revenue generator, contributing over 378204.582 to total sales. 
Regional Leader: The West region is the top-performing territory, accounting for approximately 30% of total global sales. 
Underperformer: The South region has the lowest sales volume, contributing only 18% to the total. 
Key Segment: Across all regions, the Consumer segment consistently generates the most revenue compared to Corporate or Home Office.
